product_name: Yurbuds Inspire Limited Edition Wireless Sport Earphones
long_description: Cut the cords and unleash your inner athlete with the Yurbuds Inspire Limited Edition Wireless Sport Earphones. These stereo Bluetooth earphones lock into place and give you freedom to move.
short_description: Cut the cords and unleash your inner athlete with the Yurbuds Inspire Limited Edition Wireless Sport Earphones. These stereo Bluetooth earphones lock into place and give you freedom to move.
